dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So does Debbie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chulo is using the hanger to jimmy the car lock on Cole's Porsche. He's successful. He jumps into the car and drive off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Cole are at the window. The guys are still tryin to convince Rick on his decision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got the car only two months ago --  it's got --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he looks out the window we see with him that his car i gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing) Shit, shit, shit, shit. My car's  gone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe it had something to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He charges out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odd. He's only been gone a few seconds  and I already miss him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

The cops  pick themselves up and give chase. The Manager looks insi the room and is devastated by what he sees... Hiroshima l better after the A-bomb.

dialogues.text: No, Brett, I...

dialogues.text: Our people pile out of the hotel. Rick, Debbie and all Ri friends run down the street. Suddenly a Porsche pulls up between Rick and Debbie. It's Cole. He reaches over and pulls Debbie into the car with  him. She screams.

dialogues.text: Cole, what the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drives off.

dialogues.text: He's kidnapped her! Everyone into  the bus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cole rounds a corner, a tire comes loose and rolls off the car -- thanks to Chulo's shoddy workmanship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit, shit, shit, shit, shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks to the rear and sees Rick's bus not far behind t Suddenly he spots something O.S. He grabs Debbie and runs OUT OF FRAME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A city maintenance truck is driving slowly down the cente of the street. A man in the back of the truck is leisurel placing orange cones in the center line of the road. Cole, with Debbie in tow, grabs the truck's DRIVER and ha him out of his seat. He then places Debbie inside the tru and him at the wheel. He peels out. Our man with the cone in the back is unaware of what has happened. He keeps pla the cones on the street. However, now the truck is hittin speeds in the upper 70's. The man's leisure pace speeds u He rapidly places cones on the road at break-neck speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick, is plowing into the cones and knocking them all ove

dialogues.text: Our man with the cones is almost completely exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The vehicles reach the top of the hill. Cole grabs a shar left and pulls into a movie theater parking lot. The mane loses Rick for a second. Rick jams on the brakes and doub back into the parking lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cole pulls up with a SCREECH in front of the theater. He  grabs Debbie and jumps out of the truck. He drags her int the theater entrance. Rick brings his bus to a stop and he and the gang pour ou of the bus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and Debbie stand outside the  theater, which is a multi-plex cinema.  Fourteen movie theaters under one  roof. Prominent is a sign which reads:  "24 HOUR 3D FESTIVAL!" Cole drags  Debbie into one of the theaters. The  gang runs up to the theaters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fan out and look for them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all go running into various theaters.

dialogues.text: He approaches a theater and sees the title of the movie  playing inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, I've seen this one already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick chooses a theater and goes inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The patrons are wearing their 3D glasses, watching the ac on the screen. On the movie screen we SEE a man and a wom arguing. Cole and Debbie enter the theater. They run down the front of the screen, heading for an exit. Rick enters He gives chase and catches up with Cole. He takes a swing at Cole and Cole swings back. Behind the on the screen a man has come to the rescue of the woman. A fight starts in the movie, also. The patrons sit calmly watching the action. Miraculously, Rick's fight with Cole in perfect sync with the actors in the movie. Rick hits C with a punch that sends him backwards into several movie  patrons. The patrons are impressed by the realism of the  film's special effects. Cole throws a punch. Rick ducks. punch hits a MAN in the front row in the mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to LADY next to him) Gee, what a realistic effect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, like you're in the movie with  them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick climbs over several rows and continues to pummel Col Cole grabs a woman's purse and begins to hit Rick with it Cole runs out of the aisle as Rick climbs over people and dives onto Cole, knocking him to the aisle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to his date) Best 3D I've ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the movie ends, Rick has Cole by the collar and is dra him out of the theater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick exits the theater with Cole. He tosses Cole to Chulo Debbie comes running behind Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Debbie) Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This has been quite a night. Here's  a thought. Why don't we go home and  give our private parts a workout?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hugging him) You're so romantic...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Patrons are exiting. All of them are very up and exci by their 3D experience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Man who has taken a punch and has had his jacket ripped shreds doesn't seem pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's another gorgeous day on the bluff overlooking the oc Just right for Rick and Debbie's wedding. We SEE the wedd in progress. The area is adorned with flowers. The many guests are seated and taken in the moment. Among these are Tracey, Desiree and Gary's she-man, who waves t Gary as he stands with the other ushers, Chulo, Ryko and  Larry. Chulo is choked up and trying to hide his tears. H looks over at Laverne, who smiles to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Ryko) Hey, man, don't forget my bachelor  party's next Friday night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get the hookers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Nearby stand the maids of honor, Bobbie, Phoebie and Ilen who blows a kiss to her date, Ray (one of the Japanese  businessmen). The Thomersons sit in the front row. Neither of them is  cherishing this moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto; to Mrs.  Thomerson) We'll have morons for grandkids. (resigned to the fact) But... at least we'll have grandkids.

dialogues.text: They sort of smile at each other at the thought. Father Falwell is almost through with the ceremony. A car pulls up in the b.g. Exiting the car is Stan and a WOMAN. O'Neill, the best man, sees the car. He pokes Rick. He  indicates to Rick someone has arrived.

dialogues.speaker: STAN
dialogues.text: We SEE the man in the car is Stan. He ushers the lady in car to Larry. He's surprised at who she is: his wife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, honey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you get here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick called me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larry looks to Rick and gives him a warm smile and a wave Rick acknowledges Larry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't we go someplace and talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, before I pronounce you man and  wife, the groom wishes to recite his  vow to Debbie. Richard.

dialogues.text: They fear the worst.

dialogues.text: Oh, God Almighty.

dialogues.speaker: RICK
dialogues.text: He turns to Debbie. He waits a beat and begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheese. I love you more than cheese.  And I love cheese a lot.

dialogues.text: They hide their faces in their hands.  Off in the distance a storm is coming  in fast over the ocean. The wind  begins to pick up. Undaunted, Rick  continues his soliloquy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In fact, more than dairy products in  general. I love dairy. My love is  cream. Pour me on the cereal of your  life...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick. Rick. Hey...

dialogues.text: People begin to scurry for cover. In the b.g., under a tr we SEE Larry and his wife huddled in each other's arms. F the way they look, they have worked things out.

dialogues.text: I think this song pretty much sums  up the way I feel at this moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: THE SCENE
dialogues.text: CREDITS ROLL as Rick continues to sing in the driving rai Debbie joins in on the chorus. She loves her man. Everyone has run for the safety of their cars. Everyone b the Thomersons, who sit and look on bewildered.
